snippet: Jockey Calvin Borel, who won the Kentucky Derby three times in four years, led a class of inductees into the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
abstract: Jockey Calvin Borel, who won Kentucky Derby three times in four years, leads class of inductees into the National Museum of Racing's Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Jockey Calvin Borel, who won the Kentucky Derby three times in four years, led a class of inductees into the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Borel Leads Hall of Fame Class
headline.print_headline: Borel Is Part of Hall of Fame
